Please call us at 888-886-9642 Product Highlights Get back to the basics with the PURE Yoga Shirt from Yoga Accessories. Our PURE shirt is form-fitting, so it won't fall on your face on downward dog. Made of lightweight organic cotton, our yoga shirts are long in the torso, short in the sleeves, and are flattering for any shape. Simplistic yet perfectly feminine. If you are looking for a plain scoop-neck tee, check out our NAKED Yoga Shirt. Product Recommendations
